C.W.P. No.511 of 1998
-1-
 IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT
CHANDIGARH 
C.W.P. No.511 of 1998
Date of decision:20.01.2010
Ranbir Singh
............Petitioner
Versus
State of Haryana and another 
 .........Respondents
CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ALOK SINGH
-.-
Present: Mr. Ranjit Saini, Advocate 
for the petitioner. 
Mr. Deepak Girotra, A.A.G., Haryana. 
 ALOK SINGH, J.(ORAL)

By way of present petition petitioner is seeking
Mandamus commanding the respondents to grant the same
revised pay scale to him as has been granted to the other
Works Manager (Graduate Engineer). Mr. Deepak Girotra,
AAG, Haryana appearing on behalf of the respondents, while
relying upon the Government communication vide memo
No.309/A-1/DDA dated 30.03.1990, submitted that case of the
Works Managers for the grant of the similar pay scale has
already been recommended to the Anomalies Committee to
grant revised pay scale of Rs.2000-3500.
.
Both the Counsel appearing before me fairly stated
C.W.P. No.511 of 1998
-2-
that in view of above Government communication respondents
may be directed to take decision by passing speaking on the
representation of the petitioner. 
.
In view of the above submissions, the present
petition is disposed of with the direction to the respondents to
take decision on representation (Annexure P-5) dated
.10.1980 by passing speaking order within three months from
the date of production of certified copy of this order before the
respondents. Petitioner shall be at liberty to place additional
representation before the respondents. In case petitioner is
found entitled for the revised pay scale, the same be paid to him
within three months thereafter. 

 (ALOK SINGH)
.01.2010
JUDGE
ashish
